data.eml:eml: Halocosa gen. n., a new genus of Lycosidae (Araneae) from the Palaearctic, with a redescription of H. cereipes (L. Koch, 1878)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Azarkina, Galina N., Trilikauskas, Laimonas A. (2019): Halocosa gen. n., a new genus of Lycosidae (Araneae) from the Palaearctic, with a redescription of H. cereipes (L. Koch, 1878). Zootaxa 4629 (4): 555-570, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4629.4.4
